name: Archimedes
what_did:
Archimedes made big discoveries in math, physics, and engineering.
He figured out how levers and pulleys work and explained how things float.
He shouted 'Eureka!' when he discovered how to measure volume using water.
why_matters:
Archimedes helped build the foundation of science and engineering.
His ideas are still used today in machines, boats, and math problems.
He showed that careful thinking could solve real-world puzzles.

questions.q: What word did Archimedes shout when he made a discovery?
What did he explain about floating?
What tool did he use to move heavy things?

fun_fact: Archimedes once designed machines to protect his city from invaders!
